casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antwan ANTHONY 324A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2017 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, Jonathan E. Broun, Attorney at Law, Durham, Kathryn L. VandeBerg, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Anthony, Antwan. Kimberly Robb, Assistant District Attorney, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of September 2017 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2017."
